Title: Airport '77
Writer: Arthur Hailey (novel), Michael Scheff (screenplay), David Spector (screenplay), H.A.L. Craig (story), Charles Kuenstle (story)
Actors: Jack Lemmon, Lee Grant, Brenda Vaccaro, Joseph Cotten
Plot: Art thieves hijack a 747, hit fog and crash into the ocean, trapping them and the passengers under one hundred feet of water.
